statements: SELECT * FROM device_location_data;
SELECT device_id, latitude, longitude FROM device_location_data WHERE user_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM device_location_data WHERE latitude > 30 AND longitude < -90;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM device_location_data;
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM device_location_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM device_location_data WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, user_id, longitude, latitude FROM device_location_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM device_location_data WHERE latitude < 40 AND longitude > -100;
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM device_location_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT AVG(latitude), MIN(longitude), MAX(longitude) FROM device_location_data GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM devices
SELECT device_id, user_id, latitude, longitude FROM devices
SELECT user_id, device_id, longitude, latitude FROM devices
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE user_id = 'abc123'
SELECT device_id, user_id FROM devices ORDER BY latitude DESC
SELECT device_id, user_id FROM devices WHERE latitude > 0 AND longitude < 0 ORDER BY latitude DESC, longitude ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM devices INNER JOIN device_access ON devices.device_id = device_access.device_id WHERE devices.user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND device_access.access_type = 'admin';
SELECT device_id, latitude, longitude FROM devices WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY longitude ASC, latitude DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, user_id, latitude, longitude FROM devices WHERE latitude < 0 OR longitude > 0 AND user_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001');
SELECT device_id, user_id, latitude, longitude FROM devices WHERE latitude = longitude AND user_id = '323e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
SELECT * FROM DeviceLocations;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM DeviceLocations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM AccessLogs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM AccessLogs GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_logs > 10;
SELECT * FROM DeviceLocations WHERE location_name = 'New York' ORDER BY latitude DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM DeviceLocations WHERE location_id = 1 ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM Users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT timestamp, action FROM AccessLogs WHERE user_id = 1001 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM DeviceLocations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -70;
SELECT * FROM DeviceLocation;
SELECT username, password FROM User;
SELECT user_id, device_id, access_level FROM UserLocationAccess WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT log_id, access_type, timestamp FROM AccessLogs WHERE device_id = 5;
SELECT latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM DeviceLocation ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM DeviceLocation ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT device_id, latitude, longitude FROM DeviceLocation WHERE latitude > 0
SELECT User.username, DeviceLocation.latitude, DeviceLocation.longitude FROM User JOIN DeviceLocation ON User.user_id = DeviceLocation.device_id
SELECT User.username, AccessLogs.access_type, AccessLogs.timestamp FROM User JOIN AccessLogs ON User.user_id = AccessLogs.user_id WHERE AccessLogs.access_type = 'write'
SELECT User.username, DeviceLocation.latitude, DeviceLocation.longitude FROM User JOIN DeviceLocation ON User.user_id = DeviceLocation.device_id WHERE User.username LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM DeviceLocations;
SELECT device_id, latitude, longitude FROM DeviceLocations;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT device_name, last_ping FROM Devices ORDER BY last_ping DESC;
SELECT user_id, device_id, access_time FROM AccessLogs WHERE user_id=123;
SELECT device_id, latitude, longitude FROM DeviceLocations WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT device_id, device_name, user_id FROM Devices ORDER BY last_ping DESC;
SELECT u.username, u.email, d.device_name FROM Users u JOIN Devices d ON u.user_id = d.user_id;
SELECT u.username, u.email, COUNT(al.log_id) AS access_count FROM Users u LEFT JOIN AccessLogs al ON u.user_id = al.user_id GROUP BY u.username, u.email;

SELECT d.device_name, dl.latitude, dl.longitude, al.access_time FROM Devices d JOIN DeviceLocations dl ON d.device_id = dl.device_id JOIN AccessLogs al ON d.device_id = al.device_id ORDER BY al.access_time DESC;
